tasks.label: Build SnakeByte
tasks.command: nasm -f elf32 -o SnakeByte.o SnakeByte.asm && ld -m elf_i386 --dynamic-linker /lib/ld-linux.so.2 -o SnakeByte SnakeByte.o -lncurses -lc && patchelf --set-interpreter /lib/ld-linux.so.2 SnakeByte

tasks.label: Build SnakeByte (Debug)
tasks.command: nasm -f elf32 -g -F dwarf -o SnakeByte.o SnakeByte.asm && ld -m elf_i386 --dynamic-linker /lib/ld-linux.so.2 -o SnakeByte SnakeByte.o -lncurses -lc && patchelf --set-interpreter /lib/ld-linux.so.2 SnakeByte
